page.title: 05TALKING TO A RESIDENT
page.content: {Mrs.Meharg}has lived in Littleton for seven weeks.She likes the people and goes to the Littleton Church on Sundays'.She owns her house and she moved because she needed some place bigger .Her husband's job is a paint sprayer,and he likes it a lot.She just works at home.She has two children and they go to{Harestock School.}She has a cat and a rabbit.The nearest vet and doctor is in{Winchester. }She has made two friends and she has no bestfriend. Her hobbies are sewing and knitting and her favourite is sewing.
